title: Are mystery champion tokens permanent in the shop or should I stock on them?
body:
As the question says, are these limited only for the BE shop or not?
I want to know, as if they are, I'll buy some extras for future champs.

replies.body: I don't believe those are going to be going away anytime soon. It's a little way for people to expand their roster when they don't particularly care which champ it is.

So, if I had 20 champions left that I don't own, could I buy 20 of these mystery tokens and unlock them all for a slightly lower price? Or is there some cap on how many i can buy? I think for mystery skins if you're only missing a few skins it won't let you buy a mystery chest. Just wondering if it works like that in this case as well.

I bought my last 9 champions that way and 1 extra that I didn't realize and opened with the rest (oops), so if there's a minimum is over 10 buys, and as you can see, it lets you buy even if you have none left. (just don't do the mistake of opening it after having all of them, as theres no reroll  on them anymore apparently)

How much is this any time soon, as I found this comment after some searching https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/6rAnRELs-riot-please-be-clear-about-changes-to-orange-essence?comment=0005, particulary this part "but weâ€™ll occasionally sell mystery champions for blue essence", this leads me to think is limited time, so I would like to know how much I have left and how often they come back so ideally I'll have enough to get all the new champs until it comes again.
